roleset.name: distort
roleset.note: GARBLE-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from garble.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: Accounts-1 were garbled [*-1] at the telegraph office when they sent old George down to Parkersburg for the news [*T*-2].
example.arg: when they sent old George down to Parkersburg for the news [*T*-2]
